avpCode.name: User-Name
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现User-Name字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: 3GPP-Charging-Id
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|if:874=null:then:null||illustrate|3GPP计费标识|||CCA|logic|if:865=null:then:null||illustrate|3GPP计费标识

avpCode.name: 3GPP-PDP-Type
avpCode.data: CCR|values|0;1;2;3||illustrate|0:IPv4;1:PPP;2:IPv6;3:IPv4v6|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现3GPP-PDP-Type字段

avpCode.name: 3GPP-GPRS-Negotiated-QoS-Profile
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现3GPP-GPRS-Negotiated-QoS-Profile字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: 3GPP-IMSI-MCC-MNC
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现3GPP-IMSI-MCC-MNC字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: 3GPP-GGSN-MCC-MNC
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现3GPP-GGSN-MCC-MNC字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: 3GPP-NSAPI
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现3GPP-NSAPI字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: 3GPP-Session-Stop-Indicator
avpCode.data: logicAndValue|if:416=1 or 416=2:then:null#11111111||illustrate|会话结束标识,携带在CCR-Terminate消息中,编码为8位全1比特流,用来标识会话结束

avpCode.name: 3GPP-Selection-Mode
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现3GPP-Selection-Mode字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: 3GPP-Charging-Characteristics
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现3GPP-Charging-Characteristics字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: 3GPP-SGSN-MCC-MNC
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现3GPP-SGSN-MCC-MNC字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: 3GPP-RAT-Type
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现3GPP-RAT-Type字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: 3GPP-User-Location-Info
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现3GPP-User-Location-Info字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: 3GPP-MS-TimeZone
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现3GPP-MS-TimeZone字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: Called-Station-Id
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Called-Station-Id字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: Event-Timestamp
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|time:greatEqual:1990-01-01||illustrate|该AVP的时间值应该是1990年1月1日零时以来的时间|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Event-Timestamp字段

avpCode.name: Auth-Application-Id
avpCode.data: value|4||illustrate|DCCA消息该AVP对应的值为4

avpCode.name: Redirect-Host-Usage
avpCode.data: illustrate|表示为一个DCC业务的唯一标识

avpCode.name: Session-Id
avpCode.data: logic|splitBy:;:3||illustrate|该AVP的值应以“;”相隔

avpCode.name: Origin-Host
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|endWith:.node.epc.mnc000.mcc460.3gppnetwork.org||illustrate|该AVP的值应以.node.epc.mnc000.mcc460.3gppnetwork.org结尾|||CCA|logic|endWith:.cmcc.com||illustrate|发出Diameter消息的主机,与CCR的Destination-Host必须相同

avpCode.name: Result-Code
avpCode.data: CCA|values|1001;2001;2002;3001;3002;3003;3004;3005;3006;3007;3008;3009;3010;4001;4002;4003;4010;4011;4012;5001;5002;5003;5004;5005;5006;5007;5008;5009;5010;5011;5012;5013;5014;5015;5016;5017;5030;5031||illustrate|1xxx:Informational;2xxx:Success;3xxx:ProtocolErrors;4xxx:TransientFailures;5xxx:PermanentFailure|||CCR|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包不应该出现Result-Code字段

avpCode.name: Origin-State-Id
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Origin-State-Id字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: Failed-AVP
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包不应该出现Failed-AVP字段|||CCA|

avpCode.name: Route-Record
avpCode.data: illustrate|路由记录

avpCode.name: Destination-Realm
avpCode.data: CCR|value|cmcc.com||illustrate|该AVP应取值为cmcc.com|||CCA|

avpCode.name: Destination-Host
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|endWith:.cmcc.com||illustrate|该AVP的值应以.cmcc.com结尾|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该有Destination-Host字段

avpCode.name: Termination-Cause
avpCode.data: logic|if:272=CCR and 416=3:then:1-8:else:null||illustrate|1:DIAMETER_LOGOUT(用户发起的中断)；2:DIAMETER_SERVICE_NOT_PROVIDED(业务无法提供导致的中断)；3:DIAMETER_BAD_ANSWER(Diameter客户端收到的授权应答未被成功处理)；4:DIAMETER_ADMINISTRATIVE(因为管理原因，用户没有获得接入授权或连接被断开)；5:DIAMETER_LINK_BROKEN(与用户的通信突然断开)；6:DIAMETER_AUTH_EXPIRED(会话时间到期，用户的接入终止)；7:DIAMETER_USER_MOVED(用户正在接收其它Diameter客户端的服务)；8:DIAMETER_SESSION_TIMEOUT(在线计费会话超时，服务已经终止)

avpCode.name: Origin-Realm
avpCode.data: CCR|value|epc.mnc000.mcc460.3gppnetwork.org||illustrate|该AVP应取值为epc.mnc000.mcc460.3gppnetwork.org|||CCA|value|cmcc.com||illustrate|该AVP应取值为cmcc.com,与CCR的Destination-Realm必须相同

avpCode.name: CC-Input-Octets
avpCode.data: logic|mustContain:414||illustrate|该AVP表示从终端用户收到的已使用字节数，单位为Byte

avpCode.name: CC-Output-Octets
avpCode.data: logic|mustContain:412||illustrate|该AVP表示发送到终端用户的已使用字节数，单位为Byte

avpCode.name: CC-Request-Number
avpCode.data: logic|if:416=1:then:0||illustrate|I包该AVP应取值为0，其他的相应加1

avpCode.name: CC-Request-Type
avpCode.data: values|1;2;3||illustrate|I包取值为1;U包取值为2;T包取值为3

avpCode.name: CC-Session-Failover
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|mustContain:427||illustrate|标明是否支持在一个CC会话进行过程中将CC消息流转向备用服务器|||CCR|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包不应该出现CC-Session-Failover字段

avpCode.name: CC-Time
avpCode.data: illustrate|该AVP表示为已使用时间

avpCode.name: CC-Total-Octets
avpCode.data: illustrate|该AVP表示为已使用的上下行总字节数

avpCode.name: Credit-Control-Failure-Handling
avpCode.data: CCA|logicAndValues|if:416=3:then:null#0;1;2||illustrate|0:TERMINATE;1:CONTINUE;2:RETRY_AND_TERMINATE|||CCR|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包不应该出现Credit-Control-Failure-Handling字段

avpCode.name: Final-Unit-Indication
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:416=3:then:null|illustrate|CCA的T包不应该出现Final-Unit-Indication字段|||CCR|logic|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包中不应该出现Final-Unit-Indication字段

avpCode.name: Granted-Service-Unit
avpCode.data: logic|if:416=3:then:null||illustrate|CCA中T包不需要携带该字段

avpCode.name: Rating-Group
avpCode.data: illustrate|该AVP表示为Rating组标识

avpCode.name: Redirect-Address-Type
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包中不应该出现Redirect-Address-Type字段|||CCA|logic|if:416=3:then:null|||illustrate|CCA的T包不应该出现Redirect-Address-Type字段

avpCode.name: Redirect-Server
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包中不应该出现Redirect-Server字段|||CCA|logic|if:416=3:then:null|||illustrate|CCA的T包不应该出现Redirect-Server字段

avpCode.name: Redirect-Server-Address
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包中不应该出现Redirect-Server-Address字段|||CCA|logic|if:416=3:then:null|||illustrate|CCA的T包不应该出现Redirect-Server-Address字段

avpCode.name: Requested-Service-Unit
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|if:272=CCR and 416=3:then:null||illustrate|该AVP表示为请求的服务单元或者金额总数|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Requested-Service-Unit字段

avpCode.name: Restriction-Filter-Rule
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包中不应该出现Restriction-Filter-Rule字段|||CCA|logic|if:416=3:then:null|||illustrate|CCA的T包不应该出现Restriction-Filter-Rule字段

avpCode.name: Service-Identifier
avpCode.data: illustrate|该AVP表示为业务识别标识

avpCode.name: Subscription-Id
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|appearCount:greatEqual:2$if:272=CCA:then:null$mustContain:450;444||illustrate|该AVP必须包含Subscription-id-type和Subscription-id-data|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Subscription-Id字段

avpCode.name: Subscription-Id-Data
avpCode.data: CCR|illustrate|该AVP表示为终端用户标志，用作计费号码|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Subscription-Id-Type字段

avpCode.name: Used-Service-Unit
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|if:272=CCR and 416=1:then:null||illustrate|从业务激活开始所测算出的已使用单元总数,CCR-Initial消息中不出现此AVP|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Used-Service-Unit字段

avpCode.name: Validity-Time
avpCode.data: CCA|logicAndValues|if:416=3:then:null#300-1800||illustrate|CCR的T包不应该出现Validity-Time字段，并且该字段取值应为5分钟到30分钟|||CCR|logic|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包中不应该出现Validity-Time字段

avpCode.name: Final-Unit-Action
avpCode.data: CCA|logicAndValues|if:416=3:then:null#0;1;2||illustrate|0:TERMINATE(DCC客户端必须终止业务会话);1:REDIRECT(业务处理单元必须将用户重新定向);2:RESTRICT_ACCESS(接入设备必须按照Restriction-Filter-Rule或者Filter-Id中定义的IP包过滤器来限制用户的接入)|||CCR|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包不应该出现Final-Unit-Action字段

avpCode.name: Subscription-Id-Type
avpCode.data: CCR|logicAndValues|appearCount:greatEqual:2:0;1#0-4||illustrate|0:END_USER_E164(携带MSISDN信);1:END_USER_IMSI(携带IMSI);2:END_USER_SIP_URI;3:END_USER_NAI;4:END_USER_PRIVATE|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Subscription-Id-Type字段

avpCode.name: Tariff-Time-Change
avpCode.data: CCR|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包不应该出现Tariff-Time-Change字段|||CCA|

avpCode.name: Tariff-Change-Usage
avpCode.data: CCR|illustrate|该AVP定义了在一个报告周期中发生费率切换时，所使用的单元是在费率切换前、后，或者跨越不同的费率|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Tariff-Change-Usage字段

avpCode.name: Multiple-Services-Indicator
avpCode.data: CCR|value|1||illustrate|该AVP表示多业务标识,取值要求置为1|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Multiple-Services-Indicator字段

avpCode.name: Multiple-Services-Credit-Control
avpCode.data: CCR|if:416=1:then:null||illustrate|多业务独立信用控制|||CCA|if:416=1 or 416=3:then:null||illustrate|多业务独立信用控制

avpCode.name: User-Equipment-Info
avpCode.data: CCR|illustrate|该AVP表示国际移动设备身份码及软件版本|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现User-Equipment-Info字段

avpCode.name: User-Equipment-Info-Type
avpCode.data: CCR|value|0||illustrate|该AVP取固定值0|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现User-Equipment-Info-Type字段

avpCode.name: User-Equipment-Info-Value
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现User-Equipment-Info-Value字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: Service-Context-Id
avpCode.data: CCR|value|ps@cmcc.com||illustrate|网络侧的Service-Context-Id使用ps@cmcc.com|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Service-Context-Id字段

avpCode.name: AF-Charging-Identifier
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该包含AF-Charging-Identifier字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: Flows
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该包含Flows字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: Max-Requested-Bandwidth-DL
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Max-Requested-Bandwidth-DL字段|||CCR|illustrate|GBR-UL,上行确保比特速率

avpCode.name: Max-Requested-Bandwidth-UL
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Max-Requested-Bandwidth-UL字段|||CCR|illustrate|MRB_DL,下行最大带宽请求

avpCode.name: CG-Address
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现CG-Address字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: GGSN-Address
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现GGSN-Address字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: PS-Furnish-Charging-Information
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包中不应该出现PS-Furnish-Charging-Information字段|||CCA|illustrate|在线和离线FCI计费标识

avpCode.name: PS-Free-Format-Data
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包中不应该出现PS-Free-Format-Data字段|||CCA|

avpCode.name: PS-Append-Free-Format-Data
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包中不应该出现PS-Append-Free-Format-Data字段|||CCA|

avpCode.name: Time-Quota-Threshold
avpCode.data: CCR|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包不应该出现Time-Quota-Threshold字段|||CCA|if:416=3:then:null||illustrate|CCA的T包不应该出现Time-Quota-Threshold字段

avpCode.name: Trigger-Type
avpCode.data: illustrate|该AVP用于指示单个重授权事件类型

avpCode.name: Quota-Holding-Time
avpCode.data: illustrate|配额占用时间，单位为秒

avpCode.name: Reporting-Reason
avpCode.data: CCR|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null$if:456=parentId:then:1;2;4;6;7$if:446=parentId:then:0;3;5||illustrate|0:THRESHOLD(门限Threshold到达);1:QHT(QHT到达);2:FINAL(PDP访问终止);3:QUOTA_EXHAUSTED(配额用尽);4:VALIDITY_TIME(生命期Validity-Time已经结束);5:OTHER_QUOTA_TYPE(其它配额到达报告触发条件)|||CCA|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Reporting-Reason字段

avpCode.name: Service-Information
avpCode.data: logic|mustContain:874||illustrate|业务信息，包括PS-Information信息组：874，属性为Grouped

avpCode.name: Quota-Consumption-Time
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|lessEqualAvp:871||illustrate|配额空耗时间，单位为秒;Quota-Holding-Time必须大于等于Quota-consumption-Time|||CCR|logic|if:272=CCR:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息包不应该出现Quota-Consumption-Time字段

avpCode.name: Charging-Rule-Base-Name
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Charging-Rule-Base-Name字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: qos-infomation
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现qos-infomation字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: Bearer-Identifier
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Bearer-Identifier字段|||CCR|illustrate|承载标识

avpCode.name: Guaranteed-Bitrate-DL
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Guaranteed-Bitrate-DL字段|||CCR|illustrate|GBR-DL,下行确保比特速率

avpCode.name: Guaranteed-Bitrate-UL
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Guaranteed-Bitrate-UL字段|||CCR|illustrate|GBR-UL,上行确保比特速率

avpCode.name: QoS-Class-Identifier
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现QoS-Class-Identifier字段|||CCR|illustrate|QCI-QoS分类标识

avpCode.name: Allocation-Retention-Priority
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Allocation-Retention-Priority字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: APN-Aggregate-Max-Bitrate-DL
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现APN-Aggregate-Max-Bitrate-DL字段|||CCR|illustrate|下行APN所有非GBR承载IP流聚合的最大比特率

avpCode.name: APN-Aggregate-Max-Bitrate-UL
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现APN-Aggregate-Max-Bitrate-UL字段|||CCR|illustrate|上行APN所有非GBR承载IP流聚合的最大比特率

avpCode.name: Priority-Level
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Priority-Level字段|||CCR|values|1-15||illustrate|优先级，用来指示当资源紧张时建立或修改承载是否应该被优先接受。1表示最高优先级

avpCode.name: Pre-emption-Capability
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|PEC，用来指示某业务流是否可以从其它低优先级(Prioriti-Level)抢占资源,CCA消息包不应该出现Pre-emption-Capability字段。0:PRE-EMPTION_CAPABILITY_ENABLED(允许该业务流抢占已分配到其它业务流的资源);1:PRE-EMPTION_CAPABILITY_DISABLED(不允许该业务流抢占已分配到其它业务流的资源)|||CCR|values|0;1||illustrate|PEC，用来指示某业务流是否可以从其它低优先级(Prioriti-Level)抢占资源,CCA消息包不应该出现Pre-emption-Capability字段.0:PRE-EMPTION_CAPABILITY_ENABLED(允许该业务流抢占已分配到其它业务流的资源);1:PRE-EMPTION_CAPABILITY_DISABLED(不允许该业务流抢占已分配到其它业务流的资源)

avpCode.name: Pre-emption-Vulnerability
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Pre-emption-Vulnerability字段|||CCR|values|0;1||illustrate|用来指示某业务流已分配的资源是否可以被其它高优先级业务流抢占,0:PRE-EMPTION_VULNERABILITY_ENABLED;1:PRE-EMPTION_VULNERABILITY_DISABLED

avpCode.name: PDP-Address
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现PDP-Address字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: SGSN-Address
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现SGSN-Address字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: PDP-Context-Type
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现PDP-Context-Type字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: Trigger
avpCode.data: logic|if:272=CCR and 416=1:then:null||illustrate|CCR消息中发生的事件，CCR的I包不应该出现Trigger字段

avpCode.name: AF-Correlation-Information
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现AF-Correlation-Information段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: Start-Time
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Start-Time字段|||CCR|illustrate|P-GW上代表用户会话开始时间

avpCode.name: Stop-Time
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Stop-Time字段|||CCR|illustrate|P-GW上代表用户会话结束时间

avpCode.name: Serving-Node-Type
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Serving-Node-Type字段|||CCR|values|0-5||illustrate|服务节点类型,0:SGSN;1:PMIPSGW;2:GTPSGW;3:ePDG;4:hSGW;5:MME

avpCode.name: PDN-Connection-Charging-ID
avpCode.data: CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现PDN-Connection-Charging-ID字段|||CCR|

avpCode.name: Dynamic-Address-Flag
avpCode.data: CCR|values|0;1||illustrate|0:静态;1:动态|||CCA|logic|if:272=CCA:then:null||illustrate|CCA消息包不应该出现Dynamic-Address-Flag字段
